name: Season Seven, Time for a Wedding!
How to Win Friends and Influence Monsters
The Girl with the Dungeons and Dragons Tattoo

description: The Servant Rider almost kills Shiro. As a result, Rin and Shiro form a temporary alliance to find out who Rider's master is.
name: Two Magi (Part 2)

description: While trying to destroy the force fields at school, Shiro discovers who Rider's master is.
name: Despicable Act

description: Rin decides to move in with Shiro until the danger dissipates, and Shiro and Saber still can't find a common ground.
name: Discordant Melody

description: Saber and Shiro make a deal, and Saber begins training Shiro for battle.
name: Moonlit Elegance

description: Shiro's first training session doesn't go well. Later, Rin gives Shiro a jewel to swallow, which allows him to turn on his power.
name: A Peaceful Interlude

description: In a battle against Shinji, Shiro's death becomes imminent. Luckily, he is able to summon Saber before his time runs out.
name: Fresh Blood Temple (Blood Fort Andromeda)

description: In a battle against Shinji, Saber unleashes her Noble Phantasm, Excalibur. However, it leaves her depleted, and Shiro comes to her aid.
name: Tearing The sky

description: Shiro catches a glimpse into Saber's past. Later, Shiro is captured by Ilya who makes him an offer he adamantly refuses.
name: Winter Castle

description: Archer battles Berserker to give Rin, Shiro, and Saber a chance to escape. Meanwhile, Rin's last Command Spell disappears, and Saber collapses.
name: End of The Ideal

description: Shiro gives part of his magical circuit to Saber so that she may replenish her mana. Shortly after, Ilya and Berserker return for a final match.
name: The Twelve Trials

description: Shiro manages to find a weapon powerful enough to defeat Berserker.
name: The Sword of Promised Victory

description: Sakura is captured by Caster to use as a sacrifice that will summon the Holy Grail.
name: Branded As A Witch

description: Shiro, Rin, and Saber make an attempt to rescue Sakura and prevent the Holy Grail's summon.
name: Decisive Battle

description: After Shiro and the others escape, Saber reveals the identity of the eighth servant.
name: The Golden King

description: Shiro finally realizes his feelings for Saber and invites her on a date.
name: Distant Trace of a Dream

description: Shiro and Saber are attacked by the Servant Gilgamesh. Later, Shiro decides he wants Saber to stay after the war ends.
name: The Star of Creation That Divided Heaven and Earth

description: When Kirei orders Lancer and Gilgamesh to kill Shiro and Saber, Lancer makes the ultimate sacrifice so that the two can escape.
name: At The End of Wishes

description: Shiro and Saber set out to defeat Kirei once and for all. While Shiro goes after Kirei, Saber battles Gilgamesh.
name: Holy Grail

description: Shiro and Saber combine their powers to try and defeat Gilgamesh and Kirei, and Shiro orders Saber to destroy the Holy Grail.
name: All Too Distant Utopia

description:
Japanese title: Yōkoso Zetsubō Gakuen (ようこそ絶望学園)

Makoto Naegi gets a super lucky break and enters the highly prestigious school, Hope's Peak High School. But things take a turn for the worse when Makoto learns that he's trapped in that school for the rest of his life unless he kills a classmate!
name: PROLOGUE: Welcome to Despair High School

description:
Japanese title: Ikikiru: (Hi-) Nichijō-hen (イキキル（非）日常編)

When the first person gets murdered, Makoto is the number one suspect! He must prove his innocence during the class trial or everyone but the killer will get executed. Can he find enough evidence to clear his name and identify the killer?
name: (Not) Normal Arc: Kill and Live, Part 1

description:
Japanese title: Ikikiru: (Hi-) Nichijō-hen (イキキル（非）日常編)

The first classroom trial has begun. Naegi has to think fast, or everyone innocent will get punished! Kirigiri seems to be on to something, but she isn't handing out answers. When the trial is over, will Monokuma go through with his "punishment"?
name: Not Normal Arc: Kill and Live, Part 2

description:
Japanese title: Shūkan Shōnen Zetsubō Magajin: (Hi-) Nichijō-hen (週刊少年ゼツボウマガジン （非）日常編)

Part of the second floor has opened, including the pool and locker rooms! Monokuma gives the students a few days to explore before he gets bored. They have 24 hours to kill someone or else he'll broadcast their darkest or most embarrassing secrets.
name: (Not) Normal Arc: Weekly Shonen Despair Magazine, Part 1

description:
Japanese title: Shūkan Shōnen Zetsubō Magajin: (Hi-)Nichijō-hen (週刊少年ゼツボウマガジン （非）日常編)

Togami seems convinced that the culprit in this case is a depraved serial killer, but is he merely trying to deceive his classmates? Tensions rise as some of the students' dark secrets are revealed, including an incredible secret about the victim!
name: (Not) Normal Arc: Weekly Shonen Despair Magazine, Part 2

description:
Japanese title: Shinseiki Ginga Densetsu Futatabi! Sōkō Yūsha yo Daichi ni Tate!: (Hi-) Nichijō-hen (新世紀銀河伝説再び！装甲勇者よ大地に立て！ （非）日常編)

Asahina finds ALTER EGO, an AI created by Fujisaki. Ishimaru and Yamada are smitten with the program in their own ways, and neither boy wants to play nice and share. After the laptop goes missing, a "suspicious character" begins attacking students.
name: (Not) Normal Arc: Return of the New Century Galaxy Legend! O Armored Hero, Stand upon the Earth! Part 1

description:
Japanese title: Shinseiki Ginga Densetsu Futatabi! Sōkō Yūsha yo Daichi ni Tate!: (Hi-)Nichijō-hen (新世紀銀河伝説再び！装甲勇者よ大地に立て！ （非）日常編)

Two students have been killed one after the next and all of the evidence seems to point at Hagakure. But the way Naegi sees it, things just aren't adding up quite right. Is their blood really on Hagakure's hands or has he been framed?
name: (Not) Normal Arc: Return of the New Century Galaxy Legend! O Armored Hero, Stand upon the Earth!, Part 2

description:
Japanese title: Ōru Ōru Aporojīzu: (Hi-) Nichijō-hen (オール・オール・アポロジーズ （非）日常編)

Monokuma announces that he planted a mole amongst the students. Rather than let them figure out who it is on their own, he generously offers the information. Now the rift between the surviving students is worse than ever before!
name: (Not) Normal Arc: All All Apologies

description:
Japanese title: Ōru Ōru Aporojīzu: (Hi-) Nichijō-hen (オール・オール・アポロジーズ （非）日常編)

The fourth murder case is a locked-room mystery. Two of the primary suspects for the murder aren't actually sure if they did the dirty deed or not! Can Naegi piece the clues together to figure out what really happened in the game room?
name: (Not) Normal Arc: All All Apologies II

description:
Japanese title: Shissō suru Seishun no Zetsubō Janku Fūdo: (Hi-) Nichijō-hen (疾走する青春の絶望ジャンクフード （非）日常編)

Kirigiri steals Monokuma's "treasure." He warns the students that everyone will be held equally guilty. Later that night, Togami finds that Monokuma has gone out of order. The next day, there is a new body. Could all of this somehow be related?
name: (Not) Normal Arc: The Junk Food of Despair for Racing through Youth

description:
Japanese title: Shissō suru Seishun no Zetsubō Janku Fūdo: (Hi-) Nichijō-hen (疾走する青春の絶望ジャンクフード （非）日常編)

Naegi and the others are forced to participate in an awkward classroom trial for a victim they don't know anything about. Naegi is convinced that Monokuma is plotting something, but what? And why is Kirigiri trying to paint him as the culprit?
name: (Not) Normal Arc: The Junk Food of Despair for Racing through Youth, Part 2
The Reason Super High School-Level Bad Luck Attracted Super High School-Level Murder, Super High School-Level Execution and Super High School-Level Despair

description: Proper Japanese Title: 時をこえた想い - トランクスとマイ (Toki o koeta omoi - Torankusu to Mai)
name: The Feelings that Surpass Time Trunks and Mai

description: In a strange realm within the afterlife, a band of teens called the Battlefront fight to keep the mysterious, powerful Angel from taking them to the next unknown level.
name: Departure

description: In need of more weapons, the Battlefront descends into the Guild, a subterranean gunnery where every hallway and staircase is rigged with deadly traps.
name: Guild

description: With the aid of a new member, the genius hacker, Christ, Yuri and the Battlefront decide to break into Angel’s lair and steal secrets from her hard drive. To distract the NPCs, they use the girl group Gldemo.
name: My Song

description: A replacement for the lead singer of Gldemo must be found. The manic, high-strung Yui tries desperately to assume the role. Hinata, meanwhile, seeks to avenge a mistake made long ago.
name: Day Game

description: To strip Angel of her scholastic power, Yui devises a plan for the Battlefront to replace Angel’s test results with bogus ones. But they never realize the one who replaces her may be even more sinister than Angel could ever be.
name: Favorite Flavor

description: When Angel is believed to be breaking scholastic code, Naoi uses this infringement to exert his growing power and places both Angel and Otonashi in a prison within the school.
name: Family Affair

description: Now that Naoi has seemingly joined Battlefront, Yui persuades Otonashi to let his powers of hypnosis help him recover his memories. But there are other issues at hand for the group—such as capturing the mysterious creature from a nearby river.
name: Alive

description: With Otonashi's and Angel’s newly formed alliance, dark and powerful clones of Angel have begun attacking the Battlefront with greater aggression. They must return to the trap-rigged Guild once more and risk heartbreaking, violent losses.
name: Dancer in the Dark

description: With the Angel clone situation becoming uncontrollable, Naoi proposes that they once again call upon the genius hacker, Christ. Meanwhile, Otonashi begins to remember his past.
name: In Your Memory

description: Otonashi decides that the high-strung singer, Yui, needs to be pushed into finding peace and moving on. But Yui has other plans—namely to beat the boys of Battlefront in a violent game on the soccer field.
name: Goodbye Days

description: As Hinata and Otonashi talk with Naoi, something strange happens: his shadow takes an enormous, evil form and engulf him. Making matters worse, the Shadow monsters are multiplying and taking control of the members of Battlefront and the NPCs.
name: Change the World

description: The Shadow monsters show no signs of stopping as more Battlefront members and NPCs fall victim to their strange, marauding power. Yuri takes a dangerous trip into the darkened Guild.
name: Knockin' On Heaven's Door

description: When she awakens from her dangerous solo mission, Yuri finds her surviving friends in Battlefront seem to have found peace. In an impromptu graduation ceremony, they all take steps to move on to the next level of existence.
name: Graduation

description: Yuri has a bright idea: to distract Angel, have all the members live at ‘High Tension Level’ for the next 12 hours—or suffer severe consequences.
name: Stairway to Heaven

description: Jesse's actions alienate and endanger those closest to him as we glimpse into his past and finally learn the root of all of his guilt.
name: He Gone

deck: Kagome has returned to the present day and is relaxing in her home when Inuyasha comes looking for her. However, some of Yura's demonic hair is on his body. Kagome and Inuyasha return to feudal Japan to exterminate the Yura of the hair.
name: Yura of the Demon-Hair

deck: Kagome learns Inuyasha is a half-demon; born of a human mother and a demon dog. Inuyasha's half-brother appears. In order to find out where their father's grave is, he brings Inuyasha's dead mother. But the woman turns out to be a demon known as a muonna.
name: Aristocratic Assassin, Sesshomaru

deck: The muonna makes Inuyasha reveal the location of his father's grave. Sesshomaru removes Inuyasha's right eye (the black pearl) and opens the entrance to the grave.
name: Tetsusaiga, the Phantom Sword

deck: Kagome is able to pull out the Tetsusaiga. Sesshomaru tries to kill her, and Inuyasha is angered and fights to protect Kagome.
name: Showdown! Inuyasha vs. Sesshomaru
The Toad Who Would Be Prince
Enter Shippo... Plus, The Amazing Thunder Brothers
Phantom Showdown: The Thunder Brothers vs. Tetsusaiga
Terror of the Ancient Noh Mask
The Soul Piper and the Mischievous Little Soul
The Mystery of the New Moon and the Black-haired Inuyasha
Return of the Tragic Priestess, Kikyo
Mystical Hand of the Amorous Monk, Miroku

description: Proper Japanese Title: 師弟再会 - 孫悟飯と未来トランクス (Shitei saikai - Son Gohan to "Mirai" Torankusu)
name: Master and Student Reunited Son Gohan and "Future" Trunks"

description: In a fierce gun battle Jesse faces off against Quincannon and the Meat Men to protect his church, while Tulip tries to save a friend.
name: El Valero
A Walk on the Mild Side
